title: The Temp - Part 3
description: Determined to win back her trust, Dylan refuses to let Alice walk away from the lifetime of happiness he knows they can have together. Now that he’s found his match, he will do anything to earn her forgiveness, no matter how long it takes.Still reeling from the shocking revelation of his past, Alice moves forward in her new position and leaves Dylan behind. Forgiveness isn’t in the cards after he betrayed the trust she reluctantly gave him.But when confronted with the threat of losing the only family she has left, Alice finds herself longing to have someone to lean on. Can Alice open her heart to the possibility of true love, or will her stubborn nature get in the way?
author: Lacey Wolfe
